job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: **Immediate Requirement for our Direct Client**<br><br>Job Title : SRE/OPs<br>Location : Remote<br>Duration :12 Months<br><br>Skills Looking at:<br>Needs to be familiar with the following technologies: Linux, SSH, Kubernetes, Jira, Bash, curl, docker, Jenkins, Network Stack. <br>Skills that would be a plus: Java, Go, Scala or the ability to pick up new programming languages.<br><br><br>Please share resumes to shaikm@aditiconsulting.com.
